content: **size** eu 36-41 **measurements** finished circumference 20 cm / 7 9 to fit a circumference of 19 - 21 cm / 7 5 - 8 length customizable **materials** 1 skein of friends sock wool color 48 **needles** one set of 5 dpns 2 25 mm /us 1 **yarn quality** friends sock wool hobbii 75 % wool 25 % polyamide 50 g / 01 75 oz = 210 m / 229 yds **gauge** 30 sts x 39 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern information** gracelyn socks was named for her beauty with a simple top-down construction a beautifully crafted lace cuff this sock will be nothing short of a showstopper the techniques used in the pattern are provided throughout including abbreviations for the stitches used in the pattern whether you are just getting started on your sock journey or have been knitting socks for a long time this pattern will guide you through creating a work of art you will be proud of though this pattern is written with one cast on it has a stretchiness that will allow for a wider foot it fits approximately womens size 36/37 -
